item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – A/P Engage Switches/Paddles (L CMD, C CMD, R CMD)

remarks.para: Except for ER operations, may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: En route operations and approach minimums do not require their use, and
Number of flight segments and segment duration is acceptable to flight crew.
Downgrade aircraft category dispatch status to CAT 1.
Two operative Flight Directors required to fly charted ILS CAT 1 minimums below RVR 4000 or 3/4 mile visibility.

note.para: For operations to Central, South American and Mexico destinations ONLY, the flight may not depart outbound domestic gateways with three inoperative Autopilot Systems, but may continue series of flights for repair internal specified in Repair Int Category section.

placard.para: Placard A/P Engage Switches "INOP" or MODE(S) "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.
